notes: Primary floating element at (0, 8, 0) lacks visible support.
Suggest implementation of theoretical magnetic containment field or tensile support from an orbital anchor.
Glass sphere is viable if constructed from reinforced smart-glass composites.
High energy expenditure required to maintain levitation.
Recommend integrating a zero-point energy module or Dyson-swarm collectors.

recommendation: Proceed with caution. The concept is viable with significant advancements in energy and material science. Focus on developing the levitation power source.
